GTTM_Analyser

Class RatingsGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • GTTM_Analyser.RatingsGenerator

  • public class RatingsGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that is used to generating ratings indicating how well a given EventStream fits a given Grammar object.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static RatingsGenerator getInstance()
        Returns:
        the singleton instance of this class

      • obtainRating

        public double obtainRating(GrammarContainer grammar,
                           EventStream stream)
        Used to provide an overall rating indicating how well a given EventStream object fits the grammar given by the GrammarContainer object.
        Parameters:
        grammar - the GrammarContainer object containing the grammar against which to compare the EventStream object
        stream - the EventStream object containing the stream of music which is to be compared with the given GrammarContainer object
        Returns:
        a rating indicating how well the given EventStream object fits the grammar given by the GrammarContainer object. A rating of below 0.5 indicates that the EventStream largely violates the grammar structure, and a rating equal to or greater than 0.5 indicates that the EventStream object largely does not violate the given grammar structure. A value of 1.0 indicates that there is no violation of the grammar structure. A value of 0.0 indicates a complete violation of the grammar structure.

      • obtainMetricalRating

        public double obtainMetricalRating(GrammarContainer grammar,
                                   EventStream stream)
        Generates a rating of how well a given EventStream fits the GrammarContainer structure based on the MetricalStructure analysis rules.
        Parameters:
        grammar - the GrammarContainer object containing the grammar against which to compare the EventStream object
        stream - the EventStream object containing the stream of music which is to be compared with the given GrammarContainer object
        Returns:
        a rating indicating how well the given EventStream object fits the grammar given by the GrammarContainer object. A rating of below 0.5 indicates that the EventStream largely violates the metrical grammar structure, and a rating equal to or greater than 0.5 indicates that the EventStream object largely does not violate the given metrical grammar structure. A value of 1.0 indicates that there is no violation of the metrical grammar structure. A value of 0.0 indicates a complete violation of the metrical grammar structure.

      • obtainTimeSpanReductionRating

        public double obtainTimeSpanReductionRating(GrammarContainer grammar,
                                            EventStream stream)
        Generates a rating of how well a given EventStream fits the GrammarContainer structure based on the TimeSpanReductionAnalyser analysis rules.
        Parameters:
        grammar - the GrammarContainer object containing the grammar against which to compare the EventStream object
        stream - the EventStream object containing the stream of music which is to be compared with the given GrammarContainer object
        Returns:
        a rating indicating how well the given EventStream object fits the grammar given by the GrammarContainer object. A rating of below 0.5 indicates that the EventStream largely violates the time-span reduction grammar structure, and a rating equal to or greater than 0.5 indicates that the EventStream object largely does not violate the given time-span reduction grammar structure. A value of 1.0 indicates that there is no violation of the time-span reduction grammar structure. A value of 0.0 indicates a complete violation of the time-span reduction grammar structure.

      • obtainProlongationalReductionRating

        public double obtainProlongationalReductionRating(GrammarContainer grammar,
                                                  EventStream stream)
        Generates a rating of how well a given EventStream fits the GrammarContainer structure based on the ProlongationalReductionAnalyser analysis rules.
        Parameters:
        grammar - the GrammarContainer object containing the grammar against which to compare the EventStream object
        stream - the EventStream object containing the stream of music which is to be compared with the given GrammarContainer object
        Returns:
        a rating indicating how well the given EventStream object fits the grammar given by the GrammarContainer object. A rating of below 0.5 indicates that the EventStream largely violates the prolongational reduction grammar structure, and a rating equal to or greater than 0.5 indicates that the EventStream object largely does not violate the given prolongational reduction grammar structure. A value of 1.0 indicates that there is no violation of the prolongational reduction grammar structure. A value of 0.0 indicates a complete violation of the prolongational reduction grammar structure.

      • checkBranchingCorrectness

        public double checkBranchingCorrectness(GrammarContainer grammar,
                                        EventStream stream)
        Checks how well a given EventStream fits the Prolongational branching type structure.
        Parameters:
        grammar - the GrammarContainer object containing the grammar against which to compare the EventStream object
        stream - the EventStream object containing the stream of music which is to be compared with the given GrammarContainer object
        Returns:
        a ratin between 1.0 and 0.0. A rating greater than 0.5 indicates that the EventStream largely fits the prolongational branching type structure. A rating less than 0.5 indicates that it largely does not fit the branching type structure.

      • obtainGroupingStructureRating

        public double obtainGroupingStructureRating(GrammarContainer grammar,
                                            EventStream stream)
        Designed to test a piece of music against a grammar to see how well it fits the grouping structure constraints of the grammar.
        Parameters:
        grammar - the grammar to assess the piece of music again
        stream - the piece of music
        Returns:
        a rating between 0.0 and 1.0 indicating how strongly the piece matches the grouping structure constraints.

      • obtainCadenceRating

        public double obtainCadenceRating(GrammarContainer grammar,
                                  EventStream stream)
        Generates a rating to indicate how well the EventStream fits the grammar structure cadence constraints.
        Parameters:
        grammar - the GrammarContainer object containing the grammar against which to compare the EventStream object
        stream - the EventStream object containing the stream of music which is to be compared with the given GrammarContainer object
        Returns:
        a rating between 1.0 and 0.0. A rating greater than 0.5 indicates that the EventStream largely fits the cadence constraints. A rating below 0.5 indicates that it largely doesn't fit the cadence constraints.

      • createEventMap

        public java.util.Map<Beat,Event> createEventMap(GrammarContainer grammar,
                                                EventStream stream)
        Constructs a map of Beat objects against Event objects. Beat objects mapped against a null value indicates that it is a continuation of the last Event mapped by the sequence of Beat objects.
        Parameters:
        grammar - the GrammarContainer object containing the grammar against which to compare the EventStream object
        stream - the EventStream object containing the stream of music which is to be compared with the given GrammarContainer object
        Returns:
        the constructed map of Beat objects against Event objects
